name: EggBagel
description:
------------------------Controls--------------------------

ESC = Menu

 A, D = Move

 S = Drop through platforms

Q, E = Rotate

F = Swap Character

Space = Jump

Left Click = Shoot

--------------------------------------------------------------

EggBagel is a project I made in memory of Brandon Lee Cundiff, a friend of mine who passed away from Leukemia in 2014. The theme of this project is based on inside jokes between Brandon and I; I feel like this is the game that he and I would have made if we were 8 or 10, again.

Please consider donating to the Cancer Research Institute to help the fight against all forms of cancer: https://www.cancerresearch.org/
